select material_procurement_plan.mpp_no as mppNo, material_procurement_plan.mpp_code as mppCode, material_procurement_plan.mpp_ver as mppVer, material_procurement_plan.mpp_reg_date as mppRegDate, material_procurement_plan.mpp_file as mppFile, material_procurement_plan.mpp_etc as mppEtc,

product.product_no as productNo, product.product_name as productName, product.product_code as productCode,
material.material_no as materialNo, material.material_code as materiLCode, material.material_name as materialName,
material_resource_plan.mstorage_no as mstorageNo, material_resource_plan.mrp_leadtime as mrpLeadtime,
material_storage.mstorage_code as mstorageCode, material_storage.mstorage_stock as mstorageStock
from material_procurement_plan join production_planning on material_procurement_plan.prpl_no = production_planning.prpl_no join product on production_planning.product_no = product.product_no join material_resource_plan on material_procurement_plan.mrp_no = material_resource_plan.mrp_no join material on material_resource_plan.material_no = material.material_no join material_storage on material_resource_plan.mstorage_no = material_storage.mstorage_no order by mpp_no desc

production_planning.prpl_no as prplNo, production_planning.product_cnt as productCnt,
product.product_no as productNo, product.product_name as productName, product.product_code as productCode,
